feedback_text: The product quality is excellent but shipping was very slow
Customer service was unhelpful and rude during my call
Great value for money, will definitely buy again
The website is difficult to navigate and confusing
Fast delivery and well packaged items
Product arrived damaged and return process was complicated
Love the new features in the latest update
Pricing seems too high compared to competitors
Outstanding customer support, very responsive team
The mobile app keeps crashing and needs fixes
Billing issues were resolved quickly by support
